name: @romatech/linq
description: A lightweight, powerful library that extends JavaScript arrays with LINQ-style methods for querying, transforming, and aggregating data. Supports filtering, projection, joining, grouping, sorting, set operations, and more â€” all with a fluent and expressive syntax inspired by .NET's LINQ. Fully typed and tree-shakable. This utility helps write cleaner, declarative code for data-heavy logic in both frontend and backend JavaScript/TypeScript applications.
author: RomaTech/Leandro Romanelli
